verses.text:
\w Bless|strong="H1288"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, O my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*. O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou art \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w*; thou art \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w honour|strong="H1935"\w* and \w majesty|strong="H1926"\w*.

Who \w coverest|strong="H5844"\w* \add thyself\add* with \w light|strong="H0216"\w* as \add with\add* a \w garment|strong="H8008"\w*: who stretchest \w out|strong="H5186"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* like a \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w*:

Who layeth the \w beams|strong="H7136"\w* of his \w chambers|strong="H5944"\w* in the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*: who \w maketh|strong="H7760"\w* the \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* his \w chariot|strong="H7398"\w*: who \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* upon the \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*:
Who \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* his \w angels|strong="H4397"\w* \w spirits|strong="H7307"\w*; his \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w* a \w flaming|strong="H3857"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*:

\add Who\add* \w laid|strong="H3245"\w* the \w foundations|strong="H4349"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \add that\add* it should not be \w removed|strong="H4131"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 104.5 \ft Who…: Heb. He hath founded the earth upon her bases\f*

Thou \w coveredst|strong="H3680"\w* it with the \w deep|strong="H8415"\w* as \add with\add* a \w garment|strong="H3830"\w*: the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* above the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*.
\w At|strong="H4480"\w* thy \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w* they \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*; at the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of thy \w thunder|strong="H7482"\w* they \w hasted|strong="H2648"\w* away.

They go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* by the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*; they go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* by the \w valleys|strong="H1237"\w* unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H2088"\w* thou hast \w founded|strong="H3245"\w* for them.\f + \fr 104.8 \ft They go up…: or, The mountains ascend, the valleys descend\f*

Thou hast \w set|strong="H7760"\w* a \w bound|strong="H1366"\w* that they may not pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w*; that they turn not \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

He \w sendeth|strong="H7971"\w* the \w springs|strong="H4599"\w* into the \w valleys|strong="H5158"\w*, \add which\add* \w run|strong="H1980"\w* among the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*.\f + \fr 104.10 \ft He: Heb. Who\f*\f + \fr 104.10 \ft run: Heb. walk\f*

They give \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* to every \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: the wild \w asses|strong="H6501"\w* \w quench|strong="H7665"\w* their \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*.\f + \fr 104.11 \ft quench: Heb. break\f*

By them shall the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* have their \w habitation|strong="H7931"\w*, \add which\add* \w sing|strong="H5414"\w* \w among|strong="H0996"\w* the \w branches|strong="H6073"\w*.\f + \fr 104.12 \ft sing: Heb. give a voice\f*

He \w watereth|strong="H8248"\w* the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w* from his \w chambers|strong="H5944"\w*: the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* is \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* with the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w*.

He causeth the \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* to \w grow|strong="H6779"\w* for the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, and \w herb|strong="H6212"\w* for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*: that he may bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* out of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*;

And \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \add that\add* maketh \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* of \w man|strong="H0582"\w*, \add and\add* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* to make \add his\add* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w shine|strong="H6670"\w*, and \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \add which\add* \w strengtheneth|strong="H5582"\w* \w man’s|strong="H0582"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.\f + \fr 104.15 \ft oil…: Heb. to make his face shine with oil, or, more than oil\f*

The \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* are \w full|strong="H7646"\w* \add of sap;\add* the \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, which he hath \w planted|strong="H5193"\w*;

Where the \w birds|strong="H6833"\w* make their \w nests|strong="H7077"\w*: \add as for\add* the \w stork|strong="H2624"\w*, the fir \w trees|strong="H1265"\w* \add are\add* her \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

The \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w hills|strong="H2022"\w* \add are\add* a \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* for the wild \w goats|strong="H3277"\w*; \add and\add* the \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w* for the \w conies|strong="H8227"\w*.
He \w appointed|strong="H6213"\w* the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* for \w seasons|strong="H4150"\w*: the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* his going \w down|strong="H3996"\w*.

Thou \w makest|strong="H7896"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, and it is \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: wherein all the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* do \w creep|strong="H7430"\w* \add forth\add*.\f + \fr 104.20 \ft beasts…: Heb. beasts thereof do trample on the forest\f*
The young \w lions|strong="H3715"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* after their \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*, and \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* their \w meat|strong="H0400"\w* from \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.
The \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w ariseth|strong="H2224"\w*, they gather themselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, and lay them \w down|strong="H7257"\w* in their \w dens|strong="H4585"\w*.
\w Man|strong="H0120"\w* goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* unto his \w work|strong="H6467"\w* and to his \w labour|strong="H5656"\w* until the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, how \w manifold|strong="H7231"\w* are thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w*! in \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* hast thou \w made|strong="H6213"\w* them all: the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* is \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of thy \w riches|strong="H7075"\w*.

\add So is\add* this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w wide|strong="H7342"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, wherein \add are\add* things \w creeping|strong="H7431"\w* \w innumerable|strong="H4557"\w*, both \w small|strong="H6996"\w* and \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w*.

There \w go|strong="H1980"\w* the \w ships|strong="H0591"\w*: \add there is\add* that \w leviathan|strong="H3882"\w*, \add whom\add* thou hast \w made|strong="H3335"\w* to \w play|strong="H7832"\w* therein.\f + \fr 104.26 \ft made: Heb. formed\f*
These \w wait|strong="H7663"\w* all upon thee; that thou mayest \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* their \w meat|strong="H0400"\w* in due \w season|strong="H6256"\w*.

\add That\add* thou \w givest|strong="H5414"\w* them they \w gather|strong="H3950"\w*: thou \w openest|strong="H6605"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, they are \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* with \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

Thou \w hidest|strong="H5641"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, they are \w troubled|strong="H0926"\w*: thou takest \w away|strong="H0622"\w* their \w breath|strong="H7307"\w*, they \w die|strong="H1478"\w*, and \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to their \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.

Thou \w sendest|strong="H7971"\w* forth thy \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, they are \w created|strong="H1254"\w*: and thou \w renewest|strong="H2318"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.

The \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall endure for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in his \w works|strong="H4639"\w*.  +  r 104.31  t endure: Heb. be *

He \w looketh|strong="H5027"\w* on the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and it \w trembleth|strong="H7460"\w*: he \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*, and they \w smoke|strong="H6225"\w*.

I will \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* as long as I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*: I will \w sing|strong="H2167"\w* praise to my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* while I have my \w being|strong="H5750"\w*.
My \w meditation|strong="H7879"\w* of him shall be \w sweet|strong="H6149"\w*: I will be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Let the \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* be \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* out of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and let the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* be no more. \w Bless|strong="H1288"\w* thou the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, O my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*.
